"Create a smart tape measure app that uses augmented reality to give users real-time measurements of objects in their environment."
"Develop a foldable tape measure that can be worn as a bracelet or necklace, allowing users to measure objects on-the-go without having to carry a separate tool."
"Design a tape measure with a built-in level, making it easy for users to take accurate measurements and ensure that objects are level."
"Create a tape measure that uses voice recognition technology to allow users to take measurements by simply speaking the length of the object they are measuring."
"Develop a tape measure with a built-in flashlight, making it easy for users to measure and objects in low-light environments."
